S.FORM: babaungen mipahalhal tu sapatudud i kakawsan a babaungen. siwkay nu babaungen sapakan tu Dietu, kakawsan, tuas, adingu...a kakaenan atu tuutuud. u tunuc, u dadac, u bila', u titi' nu pabuy, u lala', u ciyak, u kuwa'...canacanan. u sulit nu Hulam atu Lipun , , .
